excerpt: "Ansys Gateway is a solution for developers, designers and engineers who want to expand their Ansys simulation and computer-aided design or engineering (CAD/CAE) capability into the cloud. Using Ansys Gateway for design and modeling improves companies' ability to evolve into predictive enterprises by removing users' dependence on on-premise servers,"
